title: Bears in Love Go SMS Pro Theme
creator: JV-Designs

extendedInfo.description: *notice: There have been error reports of themes not loading especially on devices running on Jellybean. Please email us to fix the problem.Beautiful Brown Bear Design. Bears in love is a nice, and cute subtle design that isn't loud to the eyes. Its beautiful, and pleasing and just in time for valentines day. But the theme can be used any day of the week.Developed by the JV-Designs team.Download Companion Theme. Bears in Love Go Luncher EXComing Soon ... Companion themes for the Go Contacts and maybe a Go Keyboard and Locker theme-----=====**********=====-----1. You must have GO SMS installed (search "GO SMS" to download).2. To apply the theme within GO SMS: Menu -> Themes -> Choose âKawaii Fruits" theme.-----=====**********=====-----To Activate the theme specific sms popup. Please follow the following directions.1. Open Go SMS pro.2. Press menu3. Select Themes4. Select the Go Popup Tab5. Select the icon below the Go popup tab. Its like 3 horizontal lines.6. Select the "Use the Normal popup" radial optionThat should activate the theme specific sms popup.-----=====**********=====-----Tested on a Samsung Galaxy S2 and a Samsung Galaxy Note.Email us if there are any problems, questions or suggestions.Please rate if you like it. :)

reviews.title: excellent
reviews.comment: i lov it it is v beautiful nd nice dats y i giv it five star happily:)
reviews.author: Seeham Niyaz

reviews.title: White text in typing screen
reviews.comment: When i update my go sms the typing screen text background became white. I cant see the text anymore and tried to fix iy thru settings. But there\'s no option.pls fix.  Update: thank you for and you\'ve heard our concerns. :) i can now see the text font clearly.
reviews.author: Rea Naranja

reviews.title: Package file is invalid
reviews.comment: I tried to update the file but error pop up state that package file is invalid . Is my phone having problems?  Finally can update and only can use after restart my phone.
reviews.author: Wai Yee Lai

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I love this theme however it\'s impossible to compose a message with the white font as you can\'t read what you\'re writing.   If this is fixed I will happily give 5 stars....                                                   Update: Developer fixed problem very quickly, theme is now perfect :)
reviews.author: Rebecca Dawson

reviews.title: Can\'t download.
reviews.comment: I tried downloading the theme several times but it wasn\'t successful. I\'m using a wifi connection and I can download apps so fast with a high mb\'s. I dont get the point of having problem downloading this theme with a less than 2mb\'s. Beyond frustration. I installed the same theme for my go locker and i will uninstall it coz\' it didnt match with my go sms.
reviews.author: philip ceasar asuncion

reviews.title: Tq so much !!!!

reviews.comment: I am currently using this theme. I love its color, it doesn\'t hurt my eyes. It makes me feel so calm.
